data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Badghis.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Badghis, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Badghis, Afghanistan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 40 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Badghis, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Badghis.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Badghis, Afghanistan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Moghal people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Badghis, Afghanistan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 87 believers in Badghis, Afghanistan how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Badghis, Afghanistan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Badghis
location.cities_list: Ghormach, Qala i Naw, Āb-e Kamarī, Sang Atesh, Qādis
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ghormach (30,000), Qala i Naw (9,000), Āb-e Kamarī, Sang Atesh, Qādis
